sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../Styles/tours-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import { useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' const ToursDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams () const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id) const {photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour; const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not rated" ) : ( ({reviews?.length} reviews) )} {address}
{city} {distance} km {maxGroupSize} people ${price}
) } export default ToursDetails
